title: Drive to dominance: How we got to Warriors-Cavs, Part III
description: While the Cavaliers' fortunes have been tied directly to the comings and goings of LeBron James, the Warriors had only glimpses of success before drafting the core of a team that set an NBA record and is looking for its second title in three seasons.
seo_title: Drive to dominance: How we got to Warriors-Cavs, Part III
author: Emma O'Neill
